title: Offray 435991 5/8" Wide Grosgrain Ribbon, Rainbow Stripe, 3 Yards
description: From arts and crafts to hair bows, clothing alterations, seasonal decorations, and gift wrapping, our grosgrain ribbon is a great choice for tons of DIY projects. Packaged in a 3-yard spool, this Offray grosgrain ribbon measures 5/8" wide and comes in Rainbow Stripe.
